"A.P.242/3/18": "Hmph, come to meddle further in our affairs?"
"...You too were witness to that farce. Stratos is too lenient with others... and Lucotte is overly reliant on that."

"She doesn't have to talk if she doesn't wish to?
The reason doesn't matter because we are
friends? Completely and utterly laughable."
"I imagine she has some reason she won't speak. Believing that if she were to, it would hurt both her and us."
"While Stratos fears that in having her tell us, Lucotte herself would be hurt..."
"Hopeless fools, the lot of them. Do they intend to live their whole lives under these pretenses? Unacceptable...!"
"And yet, what should be done...? Is there anything I can accomplish? I do not know... the answer escapes me."
"What I... do? Something only I can do..."
"Heheheh... I've got it. I see, that was it all along... And now I shall make them see."
"A Phantom, you say? Heheheh, that is simple..."
"...I understand. There is something I can do, as a Phantom..."
"...Yes, I am a Phantom. And a Phantom does whatever it takes."
"Heheheh... If they are too frightened of hurting each other, I shall do it for them!"
"Everyone will learn exactly how the \"Black Wolf\" operates... in painstaking detail!"
